li.label: enshrouded in copper
li.description: A gentle stillness settles over you. External forces seem muted, as if the world’s noise has been wrapped in a cloak of silence. You feel unseen and safe.

li.label: wrapped in perfect stillness
li.description: Within the heart of the coppercloud, all noise and turmoil fall away. I am unseen, untouched—a sanctuary of silence.
